entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, HEAVY RAINFALL, AND TORNADOES
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
